modName: Daenerys Targaryen MoD Game of Thrones Follower
summary: MY NEW VERSION FOLLOWING THE FEEDBACK OF THE USERS!.. THANKS, SORRY AND ENJOY!
descriptionHtml:

RELOADED[/size][/color]

[color=#b4a7d6][size=3][color=#f4f4f4][size=5]Daenerys Targaryen is back and i REALLY HOPE that you like THIS VERSION!
